title: Data-Driven Online Language Learning Course Improvement Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Design emphasizing personalized feedback and course improvement through individual learner data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual learning patterns with 80% accuracy using data-driven analytical tools.
Learners can autonomously apply at least three microlearning strategies (e.g., 5-minute quizzes, word games, pronunciation feedback) in mobile environments.
Based on formative assessment results, learners can revise and implement at least two weekly learning objectives.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
